name: Mekong Delta two days tour overnight at farmer’s house
description: Trying a new experience at homestay with farmer’s house in the original Mekong Deltal. Seeing the floating market. Taking part in lively activities along river such as fishing, water transferring. Wandering into the village to see local people make sleep mats, make bricks in handy and enjoy tasty coconut in orchard garden. Trying a new experience on “ tuk tuk” or “ xe loi” on shady paths, pass by green rice fields and vegetable plains to be able to touch on real life and find out tropical culture from Peasants.
